entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:33 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:15 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: SW 16 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
